description:
During the morning assembly, Misuzu and Dolugh pass out. On top of that, they find out that a ship belonging to the giant criminal organization, DeMille, is heading toward Earth. At the same time, a handful of transfer students show up at Chuta`s school, so Chuta is asked to keep an eye on them just in case.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Pursuer from the Past: Part 1
Un poursuivant venu du passé, partie 1
過去からの追撃者・その1
